name: v_pi
description: Docker Nginx Php-FPM mySql phpMyAdmin Backups for XOm_v2.api [php:7.4.19-fpm]

scripts._APP_: bash -c " npm run _APP_BUILD_ ; docker-compose up -d ; open-cli 'http://localhost:4040/index.php' ; "
scripts._APP_BUILD_: bash -c " npm install ; bash ./system/build/Install_Node_Globals.sh ;  bash ./system/build/Create_Folders_Docker.sh ; bash ./system/build/Build_Docker_Containers.sh ; bash ./system/build/waiting_build_finish.sh ; docker restart v_pi ; sleep 10 ;  docker stop $(docker ps -aq) ;  echo 'DONE BUILD'"
scripts._O_: bash -c " npm run YD_ ; npm run _APP_ "
